Review:
You can send check requests to your candidates branded with your company logo and can customize all the templates for your diff background/reference checks based on your needs. Our account rep Beth is also super responsive and helpful. I've had companies like Checkr and Goodhire run me around for weeks without proper response/demos. Easier to understand the pricing structure as well! Less clunky than some of the software provided by stodgy/huge background check companies. Great for modern/cutting-edge tech companies.
Zinc is great, this is more of a general comment for all background check providers. It would be great if there were guidance/available documentation on standard SOC2 compliance regulations so companies who need to be compliant can easily reference them.
nan
In this culture of remote workforce it was important for us to find a vendor with global check capabilities. Clean

Review:
What drew me to CERTN was it's affordability and its east of use.  A couple of clicks and the check is sent.  Support is amazing and answers all questions in a flash and provides tips and tricks. The ability to make customized packages helps our team stay on top of things and keep things organized.  Lastly, CERTN is usually a one stop shop as it has many services; not just background checks.
While I know CERTN is trying to navigate different Provincial limitations on a number of their checks, it is still a set-back sometimes.  On occasion, it is hard to decipher when CERTN support or us, as administrators, should step in to assist a candidate.  Bring back the chat option! It was great...or maybe I just don't have access to that anymore....
nan

category: Communication, Technology, Checks, Cost, People Management, Features & Functions, Time, Adjectives

While Certn has been absolutly excellent, the one big thing we wish it had would be to have a slightly different experience for the "employee". I believe that being able to edit the email sent to the candidate would be highly beneficial.

Review:
I do like that we can see more detail as different checks are being completed.
Where to even begin. Customer service is extremely lacking. They will try to tell you something in the software isn't acting up until you send proof. They will boot your preferred drug testing location without a heads up (which was a nightmare and took months to get set up in the first place). Oh and on the second random place they sent our candidate, they lost the sample, which is inexcusable and pushed hiring back several weeks. We're lucky we didn't lose the candidate since Sterling's support told him it was still being tested (nope, never got to the lab). Finally, they will close a case as completed even if something wasn't done, as in the case of the missing drug test. Instead of reaching out to us directly to explain the mishap, they told the applicant it had been lost and marked the check as complete and to "consider" the drug test results. Completely unacceptable.
nan

Review:
The process of taking references, right to work and criminal checks has always been a lengthy process. When going through a large amount of growth, this time adds up quick. To stay compliant and automate this process, Zinc was a no brainer. The ability to create packages with different checks needed for our international team has also been great. 

Having gone from 100% manually running this process, seeing notification emails when checks have be completed through Zinc still excites me!

Zinc is an essential to my process and I will continue to use it where ever I go.
When you click into a candidates profile where you can see what checks are still outstanding, there process of getting back to the home page is not as clean. 

This is an incredibly minor flaw in an incredible tool.

Review:
Checkr allows us to see the status that a request is in, from the invitation being send, to it has been started and is pending, gives an ETA, all in an efficient manner. We have seen background checks get done in as little as three minutes because the receipient did it immediately when we sent it. Checkr's service in speed, security, ease of use for us and our candidates far exceeds that of other vendors we have worked with. In the rare case we need to reach out to them for help, they are prompt, kind, and thorough in assisting us with our request. I o
When a customer has a problem, say they mistype their SSN, I would like for them to be able to rectify that a little more easily. If there could be a phone number that they could call in the email that they receive. In these cases, we usually have to reach out to Customer Service to help clear the situation.
The quick resolution of our requests has been a game-changer. The way the candidate gets an email every day has also been a benefit to us and our candidates to help them remember and know how many days remain for the link to be active.
If you want a safe and efficient way to run background checks for your teams, Checkr is your best solution! Its capabilities make other options look archaic and out of date.
category: Communication, Performance & Quality, Complaints & Issues, Checks, Platform, People Management, Features & Functions, Time, Adjectives

Review:
I would say the effectiveness and rapidity of this platform are what set it apart from the other companies I have worked with. It is almost instant, and the details provided are enough to give you certainty. The overall appearence is also a huge quality because I think it is easy for a new user to understand at first glance. When I got the training, I felt like I understood easily. It is user-friendly and that's is not something that can be said all these companies!
There is nothing that I specifically dislike about Certn. I would say that every platform always has a margin of improvement possible. Although, I am confident that it is part of their objectives to always aim for the best, I have found that they do not always enlign with our direct need. In some way, it is understandable. For example, for background checks, we have to submitted the document stating we have the authorisation to do a search. It was not mandatory with other platforms or companies. At first, it seems like a hassle. But in definitive, it serves as a fail safe because it is anyway a regulation we need to respect.
Certn enables us to complete our recruitment processes faster than we used to. It has contributed to better overall performance. Depending on the position we are looking to fill, there are different options offered by the platform that makes it easy for us. For exemple, it is possible to do a backgroung check as well has a credit survey at the same time. In the past, that would have required two different platform and process. It is therefore of added value for our work.
I would ask for a presentation to test the system as well. Also, if your company has an ATS or CRM, it would be great to ensure that the system offers the possibility of integration to ensure that everything runs smoothly. Using Certn has been great so far, and I encourage you to check them out!

Review:
I do not like anything about this company whatsoever. This is the worst experience I've ever been apart of when it comes to a background check.
There are no positives for this company. They are not based in America (which isn't a problem) but it's extremely frustrating having to call customer service every single day regarding the SAME information I already provided them. I was told I can only provide 1099-MISC forms as an independent contractor instead of a 1099-NEC (which ks the new form to replace the 1099-MISC). I have to explain simple concepts such as Independent Contract work, and what DoorDash and ride sharing services are. Everytime I seem to call them they don't know what you spoke about with the last person. They absolutely refuse to transfer you to a person above their pay grade. To make things absolutely worse you have to provide all of the documents for the background check. Who has to provide all the documents for a background check? I should be compensated for doing their work for them. This is extremely unprofessional and I'm tired of explaining how the United States Government works when it comes to employment. I missed out on another opportunity pending an offer letter based on the background check from this company. Honestly if a company uses this service to run your background check, I'd look at that company a bit differently. There's no way this is happening still. To make things worse I submitted all my documentation at the beginning if my background check because I read the other reviews and I'm still having issues. Don't use this company.
I need a new place of employment because I'm looking for a career instead of a job and this process has been unbearable due to
HireRight. Awful
If you are an employer looking to use HireRight, don't. You'll lose a lot of candidates using this service.

Review:
We use HireRight for employee screening and drug testing. I like that it is easy to use, signing up an employee is easy, all you need is the name and email address, choose the service and send it off. It works well for American based employees who have never lived or studied anywhere else.
Their customer service leaves much to be desired. It is very frustrating trying to contact them, chat especially, and when you finally do it is like pulling teeth. It takes forever to get a straight answer. The most frustrating part is if you are transferred to a new person for help you have to explain everything all over again. If an employee has an international background their service can be a bit slow, based on the difficulty of getting the information, but what I find frustrating is when they  ask an employee fot documentation I have to chase hireright to review the documents they send, they can sit there for days without review and really delay the process.
It takes one step of bringing in a new employee of our plates and ensures it is done to legal standards. I'm not sure it's the best option out there given the poor customer service but the tool is quick to enter and keeps us informed when there is an issue with a check.
Check other options, but this is reasonable in price and quick to use. Customer service is lacking.

Review:
Certn is an all-in-one background check platform that is both cost-effective and expedient. Because candidates upload their own government ID's for biometric-based identity verification and criminal background/public safety check, you don't have to wait for the candidate to upload multiple documents. They fill everything out online and can be done in as little as 5 minutes, while the background checks themselves are usually complete within 1-2 business days.

The reference check is equally simple and efficient as an automated email is instantly sent to the referees upon the candidate submitting their contact info; referees simply follow the link to complete their reference and because the questions are highly specific, it usually only takes 5-7 minutes to complete while providing a comprehensive assessment of the candidate's performance during their reporting tenure. 

If you need any help at all, Certn has a wonderfully responsive Live Chat feature that makes it easy to reach out to an expert who can resolve any potential roadblocks or guide you towards a proper solution. 

I've used other providers such as: Sterling, HireRight, FirstAdvantage, amongst others and I can confidently state that Certn is wonderfully simple, quick and user-friendly while being price competitive.
The reference template can be submitted by the referee without actually completing the entire form; this occasionally happens, which means the employer must reach out to Certn to re-open the document and re-invite the referee to complete their reference. There should be a mechanism to prevent referees from submitting the form without completing all required fields.
Certn has helped our organization significantly improve the turnaround time for our background checks. As a high-growth software and technology company, this is vital to secure niche talent and to turn around an offer letter quickly. It's a candidates' market right now and Certn enables us to be more agile while improving our workflow since it seamlessly integrates with our cloud-based ATS. There are no more chasing referees or candidates for missing info - Certn has streamlined the process and will follow-up with candidates immediately for any missing elements. Their biometric verification and secure hosting means that our company can feel confident about the talent that we've hired.
You'll get the most efficient workflow out of Certn if it can easily integrate with your ATS; if it cannot, you can reach out to Certn directly so they can create an API that will make integration possible.
category: Communication, Technology, Checks, Platform, Cost, Integration, Documentation & Compliance, People Management, Features & Functions, Time, Adjectives

The platform is well thought out and a great opportunity to customize our needs. There's still a ton of opportunity to see what integrations with ATS' and HRMS/HRIS may look like to automate a lot of the functions. Integrations exist today but I think there's a lot more opportunity to take advantage of upgrading/expanding their automated tasks. But it's fantastic today with so much opportunity ahead.

Review:
The initial setup of Certn was easy, and there was a clear walkthrough of the setup process. The dashboard is simple enough to use and has the flexibility to provide access for different members of the team. 

The applicant experience is pretty straightforward for our applicants to complete. There are not too many questions on how to complete it. It is also helpful that it can be accessed via mobile device as some of our applicants only have access to a mobile phone. There are some minor challenges with getting the selfie image quality check completed due to lighting and other issue, but majority of applicants get through that portion.

The turnaround time for the checks is quick and efficient. Even in situations where follow-ups are required, they are completed promptly and efficiently. 

The customer support is always responsive and helpful. Also, it's always nice to talk to such friendly people who are eager to help with using the product!
The knowledge database can be enhanced with more answers so that it does not always require reaching to customer support for help. The categorization of the topics in the knowledge database is also very confusing, so sometimes, I'm not clear on if I'm looking up the correct information relevant for my product or if it is for other Certn product. 

There are some instances of checks being in limbo with no clear indication of steps to remedy or indicating that a follow-up task is initiated. This leads to jumping to contacting customer support for when the checks are required in a more timely manner. 

Looking forward to more additional customization/design options that can help improve the applicant experience, such as changing the application completion screen or messaging to provide further instructions to the applicant. That will help us tailor the experience for our applicants.
Both credit and identity check for property management and real estate transactions. This solution brings all that information into a single report that can be easily consumed by our Approval team.

The benefit includes centralizing our credit and identity check to a central location. It would also be very helpful if at some point in the future, Certn can also offer a robust income verification.

We have yet to use this feature, but it will be nice to be able to organize the applications by individual listing, so we will look forward to integrating that process into the certn to manage different listings with multiple applications.
Speak to the sales team and go through the demo of how the applicant experience is to get a full idea of its capability.
category: Communication, Performance & Quality, Technology, Checks, Platform, Documentation & Compliance, People Management, Features & Functions, Time, Adjectives

Review:
It's a good product as far as background checks, drug tests, I-9 verification and general needs relating to these items.The background checks are usually returned in a timely fashion and we have never received any incorrect information.
The customer services - when everyone is running smoothly, it is fine, but when you need help, it is very tough to get any. The company has definitely gone through some very rough patches. At one point, they changed the process of their drug testing without telling us. This caused a huge headache for several weeks and was only resolved after numerous phone calls and emails.
We are not solving business problems with Sterling. We utilize it's services and are happy with the quick turnaround with background checks and drug tests.
If you can find another vendor, use it. This is probably a good product for a much larger, less personal company.
category: Communication, Technology, Complaints & Issues, Checks, Platform, Features & Functions, Time

Review:
Some of the customer service representatives are very helpful, have good English and are knowledgeable. It is good that the background check results are visible online to the applicant.
The customer service representatives by phone are not able to see the background check application an application submitted only the employee verification team, a separate team can see it. That means when you call to follow up on your background check t

The customer service team cannot talk directly by calling or Instant Messaging or communicating directly in any way to the employment verification team. 

The employment verification team used a phone number to verify employment as the default method of verification during a pandemic when team members around the world are almost all working from home. Then once the customer service team was notified by phone that email should be used to verify employment the message, the message did not get relayed to the employment verification team and phone was still used. The case was then closed and it was determined that employment could not be verified even though they only had used telephone to verify and not email. Once a case is closed Sterling does not go back and try to verify employment. There is no flexible process to incorporate new information into a file either before and especially after a case is "closed" even if there was an error in the process along the way. 

The process is very robotic, not smart and streamlined, bureaucratic, inefficient, not centralized, impersonal and slow. There is not sense of accountability that I feel that the organization cares for my time or wants to solve my problems quickly. The technology and databases are not connected from the call center to the internal employment verification teams. Does not seem like an agile and proactive problem solving or empathetic led organization. 

When I asked to speak to a supervisor the representative mentioned it would take 1 hour to speak to one. When the supervisor called me back after 1 hour which I was unsure would happen, I accidentally hung up and no one called back again. 

Several times when I called I was disconnected and only once was called back.
nan
Background check when applying for a job. Would not recommend Sterling Background
category: Communication, Performance & Quality, Complaints & Issues, Technology, Checks, Platform, People Management, Features & Functions, Time, Adjectives

Review:
From the moment my clients started using HiPeople, we noticed a significant improvement in our recruitment efficiency. The platform's AI-powered features are nothing short of impressive. The candidate matching algorithm intelligently identifies the best-suited applicants for each position, saving us countless hours of manual screening. It has been instrumental in streamlining our hiring process and ensuring we reach top-notch candidates.

The intuitive user interface of HiPeople makes it a breeze to navigate through the platform. Even team members who are not tech-savvy found it easy to use, which is a big plus for our HR team. The software seamlessly integrates with our existing HR tools, eliminating any data silos and enabling smooth data flow.

One standout feature of HiPeople is its interview scheduling capability. The tool automatically coordinates interview times with candidates and interviewers, eliminating the back-and-forth emails and reducing the risk of scheduling conflicts. This has been a game-changer for us, allowing us to focus on meaningful interactions with candidates.
The can work a bit on the real time data reporting

Review:
HireRight allows us to contact a nominee to complete and provide its personal data without paper checks. I find it especially useful for pre-employment inspections and training verification. It's good that HireRight has an instant chat feature available so, where we need feedback, we will receive it immediately and keep up with the environment, making it easier for our clients to track the tests.
The background investigation period could take a few days to turn. Unless you intend to incorporate any further websites apart from chosen partners of HireRight, it is hard to maintain the collect page network. Also, when problems arise beyond planned maintenance, the system disruption contact.
HireRight is a tool that is managed in the HR department of my business. It's used for both pre-employment and regular MVR reviews. HireRight allows us to be DOT-compliant, keep workers responsible for upholding our workplace free of drugs and alcohol and make rational decisions about the staff who we recruit. HireRight's ability to conduct foreign inspections makes it easier and simpler as we have many candidates from outside the world
 HireRight is the appropriate tool for business that needs to complement or opt into full options for screening for experimental drugs, annual MVR pulls. Besides, it is a very affordable tool. However, it may not be suitable for back-up account managers, as it usually requests special permission to have access to your own data and records.

Review:
Really love their easy to use interface, ability to have candidate own the entire application process (where before they filled out a piece of paper and we translated it ourselves) and the idea of online adjudication if anything out of the ordinary pops up. 
Sometimes they can be a little too sensitive (but that's good really for a background check company) on what we need to sign off on and approve in order to complete a background. I get more emails than I have in any other place before because of the amount of adjudication notifications.
Our last background screening service were not professional, poor customer service and seemed to make up a lot of the compliance laws (when they're fairly black and white from county to county, state, federal, etc.). We needed someone experience in the market place, professional and automated services homebuilt and reputable large clients using their service. With the option of a possible future integration. Found it here. 
Good resource. Quality, stable and a "can't go wrong" solution. They don't blow me out of the water (as in there's nothing exceptional) but at the same time they meet every need I have in this space so happy to use them and recommend them. Implementation was a little slow - lots of paperwork and forms to sign plus you get put in a queue to get setup. So don't be expected to be turned on overnight.

Review:
I have used HireRight for I9 verification and I find it to be quick and painless.  It integrates well with our ATS and is a good tool.  I appreciate the layout and user interface the best.
Sometimes there are glitches and slowdowns in processing that can become frustrating.  
Dealing with I9s, an essential onboarding requirement, is what HireRight does really well.  I can send a link to a candidate for Section 1, and then complete Section 2 on their first day quite easily.  Even if there is a tentative non-confirmation, the instructions for that situation are spot on and resolve most issues.
Obviously, when you're considering this kind of software, you need to truly do your homework.  There are many companies out there who provide the same kind of services, but in a different format with different features - but ultimately the same product.  You're going to want to become familiar with your own company's needs and then compare with what HireRight provides.

Review:
Email notifications when background is clear. Clear and concise scoring system to determine if a candidate is eligible for hire. Great customer service when there is an issue. Account manager for our company is great. Can easily re-send background checks when necessary and run manual background checks very simply if needed.
Sometimes backgrounds take a very long time to come back, even when the candidate does not have a criminal record. This causes problems and sometimes causes us to lose applicants and hires. Emails from Sterling go to SPAM folders for many email providers slowing the process and causing on-boarding problems. This is probably the most frustrating thing with Sterling. Many applicants are delayed days and weeks because they cannot find the background check email and we eventually have to re-send it, delaying the hiring process even further. 
Streamlining our background check and drug testing process. Faster hiring and reduction of overtime when the software works properly. Overall good
I would make sure to communicate with your applicants every step of the way through their background check process. It is incredibly important to let your prospective employees know that their background will be going to their SPAM folder immediately after you send it to them, so that way they can easily locate it. Filling out the background  can also be tricky for some applicants so make yourself available to take your applicants step by step through the process. The directions on Sterling can be  a little confusing so some people need assistance submitting the background correctly.
category: Communication, Complaints & Issues, Technology, Checks, Platform, People Management, Features & Functions, Time, Adjectives

Review:
Checkr is a great tool, fast, easy to use. I like best how easy it is to send the invite to candidates and start the whole process, all done online and completed in a couple of minutes. Also it's great to have a chance to check the status of the reports at any time.
Some areas are not covered very well; there are not enough available locations to schedule and complete Physical exams and TB tests.
It makes the onboarding easier: candidates can complete the background check online, easily schedule exams, and the results are automatically visible in the system.
When a candidate receives the email invite, it often goes to the Spam/Junk folder. Also, when a candidate gets both emails for the TB test and physical exam, it can be not very clear for them to schedule both exams - they need to use both links in both emails, and the landing page is the same, so they get confused filling the same info twice.

Review:
The Checkr product is simple and effective for employers - we are able to really dig deep and know our candidates from the inside out. Yes, everyone comes to an interview with a smile and a good attitude, but the ability to know exactly who they are outside of the office on the first day is invaluable. 
So, this is a little awkward, but the only issue we have had is prospective candidates/employees complaining that they received notice of the background check and that it goes back farther than allowed ( believe 15 years instead of 7) - and also can be a little invasive such as checking the credit score which as an employer I shouldn't/don't care about. 
We are solving the problem of hiring the wrong people, or hiring someone and that person ending up being someone completely different down the line because of something hidden in their past.  Simple to
Check out what else is out there. It can be extremely useful but is a little invasive.

Review:
One of the standout features of Checkr's platform is its user-friendly interface, which made it easy for our administrators to navigate and manage the screening process. The platform's intuitive design and well-organized sections allowed both the admins and employees to swiftly enter and access the information needed. Checkr's screening process itself is also relatively quick.
Please note that all of the 5-star reviewers for Checkr are tagged as being "Incentivized." Please also note that the majority of the 0-3 star reviews were not incentivized by Checkr. Their competitive pricing played a significant role in our decision to engage with Checkr to begin with. Initially, Checkr provided us with a quote that seemed reasonable for the standard 10-panel drug test we requested. We proceeded with the setup, believing we had found a cost-effective solution. However, our optimism quickly turned to dismay when we reviewed our billing statements and discovered that Checkr was charging us double the amount we were initially quoted for the drug test.

Upon bringing this discrepancy to the attention of their billing team, we received a copy of our Master Services Agreement (MSA) where, to our dismay, we found a completely different drug test than we discussed listed on the MSA (also a 10-panel but for different substances). They stated that the one we had been ordering (the one we actually requested and were set up to order) was $25 more than the one listed in our MSA. Aside from the fact that they are unable to tell me why they would put one drug test on our MSA and then set up our account with a completely different one, it's also important to note that both of these 10-panel tests cost the same at two of the largest testing companies in the U.S. (Labcorp and Quest Diagnostics). It became evident that this alternative drug test, which we had neither requested nor discussed, was used by Checkr to justify the inflated billing rate. This reliance on a typographical error in their own documentation was both disingenuous and unacceptable.

Despite clearly stating that our account was set up to run the test we had originally requested, Checkr refused to acknowledge their mistake and refund the overbilled amount. To make matters worse, during the renewal process, they attempted to double the cost of the test. It was only when I pointed out that their MSA explicitly stated no pricing increase for a full year after the initial term that they reluctantly reverted to the original pricing. This blatant attempt to take advantage of our oversight was deeply disappointing and indicative of their unscrupulous practices.

It may seem like a good switch to save money but it is absolutely not worth it. The combination of unreliable billing practices, a refusal to rectify mistakes, and an attempt to exploit customers demonstrates a severe lack of integrity on the part of Checkr. I strongly advise against wasting your time and money on this company. Instead, invest in a reputable service provider that values transparency and adheres to agreed-upon pricing.

Save yourself the frustration and explore other options
nan
Providing expeditious background checks. Unreliable Billing Practices and Poor Customer Service -
category: Communication, Performance & Quality, Complaints & Issues, Technology, Checks, Platform, Cost, Documentation & Compliance, People Management, Features & Functions, Time, Adjectives

Review:
We've been using Checkr for several years now. The key factor for us is the flexible, well-documented API. The API has helped us take Checkr with us through three separate candidate evaluation platforms (Airtable, Bullhorn, and now Salesforce) without missing a beat. Background check turnaround times are almost always quick (with the exception of unavoidable court closures or delays), and the API allows us to handle different report results automatically, which allows us to operate at scale.
Occasionally, candidates may get "stuck" in the process of updating personal information. If someone has had a legal name change for instance, it may require us internally filing a support ticket with Checkr to resolve. Having said that, Checkr has always been quick to step in and help us resolve any such issues.
nan
Prior to Checkr, all of our background checks were conducted by an outside firm. Results had to be checked manually, resulting in a massive weekly queue of work for our staff. Now, using the Checkr API, we are able to process candidates who clear their background checks automatically. We only have to manually intervene for background checks that come back with a different status. It has saved us countless hours of work over the last few years.

Review:
Easy navigation made the process very effortless. Made getting through the application/process as simple as I have ever seen. Most of all, I would like to mention the navigation. Usually, I find that this is the biggest issue with any background checking software that I have used. So, simplified navigation makes this an amazing product. The best part was how quick it was. The information was easy and most of it prepopulated to me. Overall, would give CERTN a 10 due to how easy and simple it was to go through the process.
Nothing I disliked comes to mind when it comes to this process Certn uses. It made every section simple and easy. I am only a user so I don't know specifics but from my perspctive I think its awesome! But I had a great experience with the software and was blown away by how easy it made everything.
How can doing a background check more efficiently? Certn has the answer. Certn takes all the hassle out of the process and makes it easier for clients to utilize this system. It makes the need for support based calls/communications scarce because the navigation is that efficient. Im sure it is more cost efficient, However I can not speak on that end because I am only a user of the software. But I had a great experience with the software and was blown away by how easy it made everything. My
Recommend checking this software out before making your mind up if you are in the market for this particular type of system. Even if you already have a program you are using in your business, it is definately worth just trying it out, just to see how much easier it is. I promise you will not be disappointed nor waste your time.When you see how quick a check can be performed, that will speak for itself. No more waiting for days and headache of clients complaining or needing help. Its truly that easy.

Review:
What we like best about Certn is the speed of service, innovative technology, easy to use dashboard, affordability and customer service.

The turnaround time from start to finish is excellent, we are able to receive results/clearances within less than an hour. The user interface is very simple which makes it easy for us to train managers and new HR staff  on how to use the product, it also makes it simple for our candidates to complete.

With respect to customer service, we can always get a quick response from anyone on the Certn team, their team (whether is be through online chat or email) is very responsive and able to address all of our concerns. Our Client Success Manager - Tanya has been a pleasure to work with, she always goes above and beyond and is always checking up to make sure we are happy with the service.
Not much to dislike, as any feedback I have provided to the support team has been rectified pretty quickly.

The only struggle I have had is with candidates who have a criminal record, they don't always choose to declare their convictions or have forgotten their conviction dates,
We are looking to cease the use of hand written applications and forms, and Certn has given us this ability.

Being able to send requests remotely gives our employees the flexibility to work from home and given the global pandemic this is tremendous.
If you are looking for an electronic source for background checks, look no further. All you need is an email address and Certn does the rest.
category: Communication, Performance & Quality, Complaints & Issues, Technology, Checks, Platform, People Management, Features & Functions, Time, Adjectives

No current issues with Checkr - I continue to enjoy the added updates as a benefit, but my favorite has to be the assess feature for DoorDash. It increases our productivity in Compliance as we can rely on this tool to quickly gather info to adjudicate reports. Been using Checkr since
Communicate any future updates you are looking to change to its users

Review:
Early in my career, I used hireright. During that time, I had to fill out basic information on the applicant that we would conduct the background check on. However, now hireright supports a feature where you can email the background check form to the candidate and they can fill out the required fields to get the background started! This is great because the applicant is filling out the accurate information.
My only dislike would be certain background check elements ( criminal check) can take awhile as they are at the court's mercy to obtain information. 
If you want paperless and fast background check processing, Hireright is the way to go. Throughout the background check process, a recruiter is in the know on where the background check stands on a particular candidate.  Top Background
Hireright is now supported in the Jobvite ATS for an additional fee. With one click, you can get the background check process started easily on a candidate!
category: Communication, Performance & Quality, Complaints & Issues, Technology, Checks, Platform, Integration, Documentation & Compliance, People Management, Features & Functions, Time, Adjectives

Review:
I have used many background check companies and Checkr is by far the fastet one to date. I really appreciate the simplicity and ease of use. I can quickly log in and see if a candidate has passed or not. They make the entire process easy and painless. I appreciate when I reach out to customer support they are very quick to respond. I have been very impressed so far
My only dislike so far is that sometimes when a background check is pending due to an outside cause, the estimated time doesn't always get updated. I typically reach out to customer support when this happens and they are very quick to give me an update.
nan
Our biggest problem that Checkr was able to solve for us is the time it takes to get the background check back and completed. We are used to waiting days/weeks and sometimes even months for these to return using a different company. I have seen Checkr's turn around time take less than an hour. Time is very important to us and we want to get our new hires hired as quickly as possible to make it a good customer experience. Another problem that Checkr has solved for was to make the platform very easy to view and manage. We do not need a lot of noise when we are trying to find out if a candidate has passed or not. Having all candidates on the same page is very helpful and strategic! Fast
category: Communication, Complaints & Issues, Technology, Checks, Platform, People Management, Features & Functions, Time, Adjectives

Review:

Review:
Checkr has an easy-to-use interface, a robust knowledgebase for any Q&A, background checks come back super fast and all the data is reliable and explained well. I feel like they could provide some information around compliance relating to specific results in a returned background check.  I had one instance where someone's background check took nearly 7 weeks and I didn't receive any calls or messages from a customer support representative explaining what was taking so long - It would have been nice to hear from them.
nan
Checkr is streamlining and automating the background check process for hyper-growth start-ups, which is a tremendous benefit for a small HR team who typically doesn't have the bandwidth to manually conduct education verifications or criminal searches, etc.  Checkr nicely integrates with my ATS, Payroll, and security monitoring platform for SOC 2 compliance, making things more efficient, especially with a small HR team. Review:
I've been using HireRight for employee and contractor background checks for over 7 years now.  The process is very simple and affordable.  Customer service is quick to respond to questions and background checks typically come back very quickly.  The interface is easy to navigate and background checks can be submitted in just a few minutes.  Accounts and sub-accounts are very easy to setup and manage.  Adjudication process is very simple as well.
I don't really have anything bad to say about HireRight.  I've been very pleased with their service.  If I had to say something, it would be the list of available background checks can be a bit confusing if you don't know what kind of background check you should be running.
In my industry, all employees and contractors must have a seven year background check.  HireRight has simplified this process for us to the point where a background check can be submitted in a few minutes and results are typically turned around in a few days, sometimes within the same day depending on the areas where the background check is being run. Easy To Use Background
If you're in the market for a background check company/platform, I would highly suggest HireRight.  Their customer service is top notch (both phone and online chat).  The interface is very easy to navigate which makes submitted background checks a breeze.  The adjudication process takes but a few seconds.  Highly highly recommend.
category: Communication, Performance & Quality, Complaints & Issues, Technology, Checks, Platform, Cost, People Management, Time, Adjectives

Review:
Very simple workflow and easy to select from the menu of different types of checks.  I love that I can create packages for different classes of employees - makes it super easy to kick off a bg check during the pre-employment phase.
I do not like the credit reporting piece.  We are a regulated financial institution and need to perform a credit check of certain employees who handle customer funds, per our regulators. The problem is we're seeing only a credit history and not an actual credit score of any kind.  I know that Certn support has said that it's a regulatory or policy issue from the credit bureau but not having a credit score of any kind is inconsistent with what our regulators have requested we have.
nan
Makes it really clean and easy for us to conduct pre-employment background checks for all prospective new hires.  Kicking off the process is as simple as inputting the email address of the subject and selecting what package or which type of check(s) to conduct.  Couldn't be simpler.

So, if the candidate does not post a job and date range for the job from which he was fired, HireRight will not include it.
Everything online was very easy to use. HireRight...is it the

Honestly, there isn't anything about Checkr that I dislike, I am really pleased with the platform and service.
This saves us so much time in our hiring and onboarding process. Background checks are no longer a bottleneck. Review:
Self serve portal allows you to view and manage information about your case
Hands down the worst agency for background checks.

They spent three weeks trying to verify my criminal record in Santa Cruz County. I drove all the way to Santa Cruz to find out that higherright has never once contacted the appropriate dept, and that dozens of people have been coming in for the same issue.

Every county is different, and higherright had no idea know how get this info from Santa Cruz County.

When I spoke to hireright's customer service, they told me that they had "researchers" physically going to the county offices to get criminal records.

First off, that's the most suboptimal process for today's day and age. Second off, the clerk at Santa Cruz County office said they had never once seen anyone physically pick up records from their office for an employee background check. The customer service rep either had no idea what she was talking about... or was lying to my face.

Higher rate has delayed me from starting a new job been extra three weeks due to their failures.
nan

Review:
Once set up, Checkr provided easy, compliant correspondence between candidates, the county and federal offices & databases, and the company.
During the initial setup of Checkr, I had to go back and forth with customer service in order to get the reports/checks combined the way I wanted them to be.  For example, our finance team required both a credit and a standard new employee background check.  Per Checkr's policies, I was unable to run two different reports on the same employee within a certain window.  (I believe it was either 14 or 30 days, but this situation occurred about 2 years ago).  With the help of customer service, they were able to combine two searches into one ordered "report" so that we could get around this Checkr issue going forward.  Also, their standard report adds in educational verification (at an additional cost); if you are looking to run the standard, basic federal & county searches, make sure to call customer service to get this 'standard' add on removed (we do our own educational verification by requesting transcripts directly from universities).
Per our standard business processes, we need to run background checks as a condition of employment at our firm.  When switching from one PEO to another, we discovered that going through Checkr for this service directly would be more cost effective than having a PEO continue to run this process for us (i.e. both PEOs also used Checkr, but they were charging us an additional fee to manage the background checks.  We just cut out the middle man).
Be certain to get the reports configured the way that you'd like at the time of rollout - do not just go with the Checkr standard.  Also, there may be opportunities for reduced pricing if you are with a PEO and mention this to Checkr.  (i.e. you can get the PEO pricing, even if administering Checkr in-house).
category: Communication, Complaints & Issues, Technology, Checks, Platform, Cost, Documentation & Compliance, People Management, Time, Adjectives

Review:
Once the information is received it is typically easy to read, review and understand. It works well integrated through tenstreet.
Data takes a while to get back, background checks sometimes miss things, There are too many boxes to check as opposed to a "save my preferences" check when running reports. Also, they get really picky about having the exact right name (hard to do on folks with several names) instead of just giving things to you from the SSN primarily. This makes running those reports frustrating and I have to do it several times until I guess exactly how they have the name in the system. Also some of the picky states like CA, WA and PA are not easy to run reports on. I wish they integrated the legal aspect into their releases so that we can just get it done.
I recruit truck drivers, this software quickly gets the License information back to me which lets me move forward in the hiring process.
A pretty typical background check software. I would look at other options first. Review:
Criminal searches are completed quickly and accurately for the most part. 
Customer facing roles are outside the US.  While I find that frustrating, it is even more so for candidates.  I often get complaints from candidates that they had a hard time understanding the representative they spoke with.  Furthermore, candidates are very skeptical of the authenticity of the call. Employment verifications are handled poorly and candidates are often asked for tax documentation for verification purposes.  In those cases, I am forced to handle the verification myself. 
I appreciate that Sterling offers onboarding document completion.  It's beneficial to have the background check and onboarding in one system.
Customer facing operation should not be outsourced to India.  It's frustrating for both the customer and their candidates.  Employment verifications are handled poorly.  What Sterling can't complete in a week, I do in 10 minutes.
category: Communication, Performance & Quality, Complaints & Issues, Checks, Platform, Documentation & Compliance, People Management, Time, Adjectives

Review:
I've recently come across HiPeople, a human resources software company, and I have to say, I'm impressed. They offer an AI-powered talent management platform that analyzes candidate data to identify the best fit for a role. Plus, they have a user-friendly platform for conducting reference checks that streamlines the process and displays answers in an organized manner. For someone who has experienced the tedium of lengthy phone calls during reference checks, you can appreciate how this solution saves time and effort. I've even heard great feedback from agencies that have used it for their hiring process.
Currently, there isn't anything that stands out to me, but I'm still really excited to seeing more updates in the product soon. I really appreciate the effort that HiPeople puts into innovating and improving the HR processes.
nan
By automating candidate assessments, reference checks, and quality assurance reporting, HiPeople takes care of all the manual work involved in these tasks. This efficiency allows to focus on essential tasks or objectives.
category: Performance & Quality, Technology, Checks, Platform, Documentation & Compliance, People Management, Time, Adjectives

Review:
It really cuts down the time on the administrative side. All I have to do is add the candidate's email and it sends it off to the candidate and provides a very clean and easy-to-read report once it is complete. I was able to understand how to use the website right away. Everything is very clear as there are not many clicks needed to make to get the whole check done - it is very efficient and quick. Easily able to download the completed report for our own records afterward as well.
Creating the package was the only thing that was a bit confusing - there are a lot of options that appear to be somewhat similar to each other, so it just requires a moment to read all the different options, but once you know which ones you are selecting, it is easy and you can save those as a package for future use.
Saving me a ton of time in the onboarding process as the candidate is the one who has to enter all the documents as well. It easily reads the report to tell me if it is clear or not, and then i know by seeing the green indicator that we are good to go and that everything is clear.
Highly recommend. Very competitive price as well as very easy to use for administrators, and quick to run.
category: Performance & Quality, Technology, Platform, Cost, Documentation & Compliance, People Management, Features & Functions, Time, Adjectives

Review:

Calling to check on backgrounds that were supposed to be expedited only to find that no reps had "touched" them. This has happened on multiple occasions. 
The business need is to ensure that we aren't hiring people whose backgrounds don't meet our minimum standards. The benefit is that we don't have to have a background team in house. 
Make sure that you get the name of the rep who you speak with each time so that you can reference any quoted estimated time of completion dates if you end up talking to a supervisor or a different rep.

Zinc is helping me to streamline this process and free up time to do my actual job!

Review:
Sterling Talent is human resources solution that makes hiring much effective and recruitment of employees much simpler. It offers many benefits and helps in drug testing of candidates with any serious health issue. Employee forms and on-boarding services are also provided by it. You can do workforce monitoring in a more efficient manner. It provides the functionality of batch processing .The customer is really satisfied with company’s services and support provided is above reproach.  The self service portal allows you to download the reports. You can make schedules of drug tests and medical appointments. Also the status of applicants can be tracked very easily. The reminders and alerts are there to notify you every single detail through emails and also it makes use of dashboards.
Above all mentioned advantages, the stumbling blocks gathered by Sterling talent solution includes its time consuming trait as it takes a lot of time to carry out the process. And company takes much time to give response as well. The billing process is also overwhelming thus needs more improvement to stand out. The updated versions are not up-to mark and have the same problems as with previous ones.
nan
Sterling being seamless well suited automated software is strongly recommended. The user interface is steadiness and easy to navigate. It strengthens the pillars of reliance and wellbeing. You can make better business decisions through the accurate results offered by Sterling Talent solutions.
category: Communication, Performance & Quality, Complaints & Issues, Technology, Platform, Documentation & Compliance, People Management, Features & Functions, Time, Adjectives
